UserInfo.bio:
Paul Gordon Brown is a PhD Candidate, speaker and educator specializing in the impact of technology, social media and design on college student learning and development. A coffee adherent, a traveler and a thrill seeker, Paul has worked in various locations from Anchorage to London. He is an independent speaker and consultant, keynoting conferences and speaking to diverse audiences nationally and internationally.
Paul’s most recent book includes a collaboration with Erik Qualman as a contributing author to "What Happens On Campus Stays on YouTube." A work that educates college students on the new realities of living online lives. Now available on Amazon.
